text: The women's heptathlon event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 19 and 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Carolina Klüft ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Olga Alekseyeva ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Olga Levenkova ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 19/20 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
